summary: A mysterious explosion occurs at the Balam Bridge in Seoul on November 20th, 1994. In front of hot-blooded local news reporter Lee Bang-Woo, Yoon Hyeok appears. Yoon Hyeok is from the same ... See full summary Â»
cast: Jung-min Hwang|Jin Goo|Min-hee Kim|Sang-ho Kim|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Bo-yeon Kim|Man-sik Jeong|Min-Jae Kim|Sung-Woo Bae|Yun-beom Bae|Soo-Yeon Han|Dong-gyoo Jeong|Young-chang Song|Kil-kang Ahn|Hie-bong Jo|Kijoon Hong
title: Mo-bi-dik
